body: At 8th level, the undead lord's spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities used to heal undead heal an extra 50% damage. At 16th level, these effects automatically heal the maximum possible damage for the effect + the extra 50%. This does not stack with abilities or feats such as Empower Spell or Maximize Spell.
name: Unlife Healer
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Undead Lord/Unlife Healer
